nodes.text: Mercenaries' Despair was the name of a painting available in the galaxy sometime after the Battle of Yavin during the time of the Galactic Civil War. The master painting was part of a two-painting set which attempted to capture the despair and internal struggle in the hearts of mercenaries throughout the galaxy. This particular painting depicted a female Zabrak mercenary full of despair.
Mercenaries' Despair was a painting in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
